name: Returns Experience Overhaul (Self-Service + Policy Simplification)

name: Warehouse Slotting Optimization for Peak Season
description: Re-slot top SKUs, improve pick paths, and reduce fulfillment cycle time ahead of peak demand.

name: Holiday Paid Social + Influencer Launch Campaign
description: Launch holiday campaign with paid social + creators; deliver creative system and measurement plan.

name: Fraud Rules Refresh + Chargeback Reduction
description: Tune fraud rules and implement monitoring to reduce chargebacks while maintaining conversion.

name: Checkout Performance & Conversion Sprint
description: Improve checkout speed and UX; ship instrumentation and experiments to lift conversion.

name: Inventory Accuracy Program (Cycle Counts + Scanner Rollout)
description: Deploy scanners and cycle-count SOPs to improve inventory accuracy and reduce oversells.

name: Lifecycle Email Personalization MVP
description: Build segmentation + templates for lifecycle journeys and measure engagement lifts.

name: Product Detail Page Creative Refresh (UGC + Image System)
description: Refresh PDP visual system including UGC modules and updated image guidelines.

name: Shopify Replatform Phase 1 (Catalog + Theme Architecture)
description: Re-architect theme and catalog structure for scalability; establish deployment pipeline.

name: International Shipping Expansion (Duties/Taxes + Carriers)
description: Add carriers and duties/taxes handling for international customers, with updated CX workflows.
